sentences.en: Colorimeter , React - R - Mill, Reagent dye Dispenser , Electronic Balance Cyclone Sample Mill.
sentences.cn: 色度计、反应碾磨机 、 染色试剂、电子天平 、 样品碾磨机.

sentences.en: Detachable mechanism allows easy replacement without dismantling the dispenser.
sentences.cn: 拆卸机制允许简易拆换,而无需拆卸整个喷雾器.

sentences.en: Electric Rice Cooker, Electric Rice Warmer , Water Dispenser, Electric Iron, Water Dispenser.
sentences.cn: 采购产品电饭锅,电米取暖器,水分配器, 电熨斗, 水分配器.

sentences.en: I walked directly to the big old red - and - white dispenser.
sentences.cn: 我径直走向那台红白 相间 的巨大的老自动售货机.

sentences.en: Mainly provide Yun - ping machine, in leather machine, squeezing water dispenser, Beng - machines.
sentences.cn: 主要提供有运平机, 量革机, 挤水机, 绷平机等.

sentences.en: Put the dispenser body onto the suckers then press down to fix.
sentences.cn: 将牙膏器后座的孔对准吸盘螺帽上安装,并往下拉动固定.

sentences.en: Quietly but surely he retired Hanna as chief dispenser of patronage.
sentences.cn: 他不声不响但稳扎稳打地不让汉纳再作首席政治施惠人.

sentences.en: Returns the underlying transaction object created by the transaction dispenser.
sentences.cn: 返回由事务分配器创建的基本事务对象.

sentences.en: Super percision fluid dispenser , parts ( Syringe, nozzle , valve, tank and so on ) and FAD system.
sentences.cn: 液体精密定量吐出装置系统及周边各种配套精密配件,如针筒,针嘴,点胶阀, 压力罐等.

sentences.en: The dispenser quickly filled the prescription for me.
sentences.cn: 药剂师立刻照处方为我配了药.

sentences.en: The intelligent dispenser system for CWS cotton towel rolls prevents misuse.
sentences.cn: CWS毛巾卷分配器的智能系统防止了滥用.

sentences.en: Then she selects a full text, which is decrypted by her dispenser.
sentences.cn: 然后她选择由“分发器”解密的全文.

sentences.en: There be a paper towel dispenser in the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 卫生间里有自动出纸巾的装置.

sentences.en: This fact indicates that China has already mastered, and has been continuously improving, its dispenser design technique.
sentences.cn: 这些事实表明中国早已掌握并不断发展分配器设计技术.

sentences.en: Together , the dispenser and sideside cartridge precisely ensure the proper ratio.
sentences.cn: AB胶枪和与之相配合的AB胶筒,精确的确保了恰当的比例.

trans.tran_cn: 配药师，分配器，自动售卖机，自动取款机（或饮水机等）
trans.tran_en: a machine which provides a particular amount of a product or substance when you press a button or put money into it
